title: My computer freezes every time i enter a game of league
body: SO every time that i launch into league sense i updated my computer my computer has frozen. Does anyone know how to fix that. I believe it might be because of my graphics setting but sense I currently have a leave buster because of the problem and i cant open my settings for graphics without being in the game i do not know how to fix this problem. If you have any ideas on how to fix this i would be very thankful. Thank you, Bye.

replies.body:
Because you're running Windows 10, this may be a direct result of the recent Anniversary updates which enabled the Xbox Game DVR feature by default. I recommend [temporarily disabling](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) that feature to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this helped.

Now do note I'm not a moderator, but if you meant you upgraded your computer to windows 10 from a previous version then the problem could be that your running a client that was designed for windows 7 or windows 8. If you kept the files when upgrading then try uninstalling the program, then getting a fresh install from the official league of legends site.

(I deleted my last comment due to bad wording)

I'm not saying that I can be the one to help, but for the mods sake. You should state at least what iOS you have (Mac, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10), if you've changed anything in your settings recently, and maybe your computers specs. It'll just make it easier to pinpoint which problem you have, you were pretty vague.
